technologies.name: Ibexa DXP
technologies.description: Ibexa DXP is an open-source enterprise PHP content management system (CMS) and Digital Experience Platform (DXP) developed by the company Ibexa (known previously as eZ Systems).

technologies.name: Salesforce
technologies.description: Salesforce is a cloud computing service software (SaaS) that specializes in customer relationship management (CRM).

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: Firebase
technologies.description: Firebase is a Google-backed application development software that enables developers to develop iOS, Android and Web apps.

technologies.name: Symfony
technologies.description: Symfony is a PHP web application framework and a set of reusable PHP components/libraries.

technologies.name: Varnish
technologies.description: Varnish is a reverse caching proxy.

technologies.name: Stimulus
technologies.description: A modest JavaScript framework for the HTML you already have.

technologies.name: Cloudflare Browser Insights
technologies.description: Cloudflare Browser Insights is a tool that measures the performance of websites from the perspective of users.

technologies.name: Turbo
technologies.description: Turbo is a JavaScript framework for building fast web applications.

technologies.name: Salesforce Service Cloud
technologies.description: Salesforce Service Cloud is a customer relationship management (CRM) platform for customer service and support.

technologies.name: Microsoft Advertising
technologies.description: Microsoft Advertising is an online advertising platform developed by Microsoft.

technologies.name: LazySizes
technologies.description: LazySizes is a JavaScript library used to delay the loading of images (iframes, scripts, etc) until they come into view.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: reCAPTCHA
technologies.description: reCAPTCHA is a free service from Google that helps protect websites from spam and abuse.

technologies.name: Sectigo
technologies.description: Sectigo provides SSL certificate and computer security products.

technologies.name: Cloudflare
technologies.description: Cloudflare is a web-infrastructure and website-security company, providing content-delivery-network services, DDoS mitigation, Internet security, and distributed domain-name-server services.

technologies.name: Webpack
technologies.description: Webpack is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

technologies.name: PWA
technologies.description: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) are web apps built and enhanced with modern APIs to deliver enhanced capabilities, reliability, and installability while reaching anyone, anywhere, on any device, all with a single codebase.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: HTTP/3
technologies.description: HTTP/3 is the third major version of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol used to exchange information on the World Wide Web.
